Sentencas: Biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell (BG-SOFC) combined heat and power (CHP) systems are of major interest in the context of climate change mitigation, energy security and increasing energy efficiency.
Titulo: Process simulation of biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Aspen Plus is employed to simulate various BG-SOFC CHP systems.
Titulo: Process simulation of biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The aim of the research work is to investigate the technical feasibility of these systems and to study the influence of important operating parameters and examine integration options.
Titulo: Process simulation of biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Systems based on dual fluidised bed steam gasification and tubular SOFC technologies are modelled.
Titulo: Process simulation of biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The cathode recycle and electric heater integration options are not attractive in comparison to the base case anode recycle system.
Titulo: Process simulation of biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Thermal integration, i.e. using SOFC flue gas as gasifier oxidant, is desirable.
Titulo: Process simulation of biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Lowering the syngas preheat temperature (prior to SOFC anodes) is highly recommended and is more practical than lowering the cathode air preheat temperature.
Titulo: Process simulation of biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Results of the parametric study indicate that: steam to carbon ratio and biomass moisture content should be as low as possible; fuel utilisation factor can change the mode of operation of the plant (focus on electricity or heat); high temperature syngas cleaning is very attractive; gasification air preheating is more attractive than gasification steam superheating.
Titulo: Process simulation of biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: High efficiencies are predicted, proving the technical feasibility of BG-SOFC CHP systems.
Titulo: Process simulation of biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell stack
